title: The community
body:
This is my first post so i decided to go with the most important/annoying thing in league the community.
I have played league for a while and I know very well that someday you will be matched with 3 people who will either dc or feed. Then they will blame you for not using mia when you did. So i try to keep the salt lvl at a minimum by swearing with my voice not my keys sometimes people call me out and i have a flame who doesn't once every often so i need to know why am i matched with people like this when i try hard not to be a negative person on the team this is mainly ranked but also norms.

replies.body:
You should be "mia-ing" but also they should also keep their eyes on the mini-map.

The "you didn't call mia" is just a dump of salt.
